channel.title: Project insanity!

item.title: Project insanity!
item.dc:creator: @Blyth1 Blyth1
item.description:
@Blyth1 wrote:

i need a working givemod , giveadmin , giveowner e.t.c command , i have got these added but when in game giving it it doesn’t work i need a working ones i will post below the commands i have got !

give mod

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Blyth”)) {
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“givemod”)) {
try {
String teleTo = playerCommand.substring(6);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(teleTo)) {
Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
p.playerRights = 1;
p.disconnected = true;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player is not online.”);
}
}
}

giveadmin

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Blyth”)) {
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveadmin”)) {
try {
String teleTo = playerCommand.substring(6);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(teleTo)) {
Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
p.playerRights = 2;
p.disconnected = true;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player is not online.”);
}
}
}

givehidden

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Blyth”)) {
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“givehidden”)) {
try {
String teleTo = playerCommand.substring(6);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(teleTo)) {
Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
p.playerRights = 4;
p.disconnected = true;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player is not online.”);
}
}
}

giveowner

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Blyth”)) {
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveowner”)) {
try {
String teleTo = playerCommand.substring(6);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(teleTo)) {
Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
p.playerRights = 3;
p.disconnected = true;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player is not online.”);
}
}
}

please post below if u can give me working commands or tell me what the problem is thanks allot

Read full topic
